query:
select
    null as "id",
    '默认分类' as "name!",
    count(编号) as "count!"
from
    表情
where
    分类编号 is null
    and 用户编号 = $1
union all (
    select
        cat.编号 as "id",
        cat.名称 as "name",
        t.count as "count!"
    from
        分类 as cat,
        lateral (
            select
                count(编号) as count
            from
                表情 as emoji
            where
                emoji.分类编号 = cat.编号) as t
        where
            cat.用户编号 = $1
        order by
            id desc)
